channel.title: Ryan Stanton on tracker
channel.description: Recent content in Ryan Stanton on tracker

item.title: Arborbike, a first review
item.description:
Plus: fun to ride, big front basket. It's a very nice bike that you're riding, with a good 3 speed shifter and a very sturdy construction.

Minus: no lights, no bell, no helmets. More specifically, I am told that the lights come on automatically, and that there is a bell somewhere, but I didn't find it and it wasn't labelled. I did have a helmet with me so I wore that.

See arborbike.org for more details.

Thanks to John Hritz - photo credit Ryan Stanton.
